hero.title: Java Developer | Backend Engineer
hero.subtitle: Growing & Learning Together
hero.description: Hi, I'm a passionate Java Developer with 4 years of experience, passionate about building scalable and high-performing backend systems. I love solving complex backend challenges, designing efficient microservices, and improving application performance. I strongly believe in continuous learning and collaboration, which is why I'm currently diving deeper into System Design principles and exploring React to expand my technical skill set.
